Translations.Text: Alipha- lama-ra, egulo hacche ayata mahagrantha o suspasta kura'anera
Kakhano kakhano kaphirara akankha karabe ye, tara yadi musalima hata

kono jati tara nirdista kalake tbaranbita karate pare na, bilambita'o karate pare na
